snippet.title: The Invincible - First Gameplay Showcase
snippet.description:
Begin an eerie adventure as astrobiologist Yasna, watching our first gameplay showcase of The Invincible: a deep, atompunk story set in a hard sci-fi world by Stanisław Lem.
🚀 Wishlist now on:
Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/731040/The_Invincible/)
Epic Games Store (https://store.epicgames.com/pl/p/the-invincible)
GOG.com (https://www.gog.com/game/the_invincible)

Use atompunk tools to find the missing crew, make choices, deal with their consequences and face threats unforeseen by mankind…

It is time you rethink human’s dominion in the universe, while experiencing mind-boggling science phenomena on Regis III.

Take part in the philosophical adventure created by Starward Industries and empowered by 11 bit studios - the game rooted in the idea of meaningful entertainment.

Start your mission early and dive into The Invincible side stories on:
https://invinciblethegame.com/

Also subscribe to our channel and follow The Invincible news here:
Discord: https://discord.gg/7CMcj3ZEp6
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarwardInd
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/StarwardIndustries
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/starwardindustries/

#theinvincible #videogame #hardscifi #pcgame #retrofuture #consolegame #atompunk #storydriven #adventuregame
